1.title: The 7-Figure Sales System - Master High-Ticket Closing
1.description: Learn proven frameworks to master sales psychology, handle objections, and close high-ticket deals consistently. Transform from amateur to elite closer.

instructor.name: Marcus Johnson
instructor.bio: Sales expert with over 15 years of experience in high-ticket closing. Helped over 10,000 sales professionals increase their closing rates by 300%.
credentials: Former VP of Sales at TechCorp

whatYouWillLearn: Master the psychology of high-ticket sales
requirements: Access to phone/computer for role-playing exercises

modules.title: Sales Psychology Fundamentals
modules.description: Understanding the core psychological principles that drive purchasing decisions.

lessons.title: The Psychology of Buying Decisions
lessons.description: Learn the fundamental psychological triggers that influence buying decisions and how to ethically leverage them.

lessons.title: Building Instant Rapport
lessons.description: Master the art of building instant connection and trust with any prospect within the first 2 minutes.

lessons.title: Identifying Decision Makers
lessons.description: Learn to quickly identify who holds the purchasing power and how to get them engaged.

lessons.title: The Power of Social Proof
lessons.description: Discover how to use testimonials, case studies, and social proof to accelerate the sales process.

modules.title: Advanced Objection Handling
modules.description: Turn every objection into a closing opportunity with proven frameworks.

lessons.title: The RISE Objection Framework
lessons.description: Master the RISE framework: Reframe, Isolate, Support, Execute - the ultimate objection handling system.

lessons.title: Handling Price Objections
lessons.description: Never lose a deal to price again. Learn 7 proven techniques to overcome price resistance.

lessons.title: Time and Authority Objections
lessons.description: Handle 'I need to think about it' and 'I need to ask my spouse' objections like a pro.

lessons.title: Converting Skeptics to Buyers
lessons.description: Turn the most skeptical prospects into your biggest advocates with advanced persuasion techniques.

modules.title: High-Ticket Closing Techniques
modules.description: Advanced strategies for closing deals worth $10,000 and above.

lessons.title: The Assumption Close Method
lessons.description: Learn to close deals by assuming the sale and guiding prospects through the natural buying process.

lessons.title: Creating Irresistible Urgency
lessons.description: Build genuine urgency that compels prospects to act now without being manipulative.

lessons.title: The Take-Away Technique
lessons.description: Use scarcity and exclusivity to increase desire and close high-ticket sales.

lessons.title: Handling Multiple Decision Makers
lessons.description: Navigate complex B2B sales with multiple stakeholders and varying interests.

lessons.title: The Million Dollar Close
lessons.description: The ultimate closing sequence used by top 1% sales professionals to close massive deals.

modules.title: Sales Mindset & Personal Development
modules.description: Develop the unshakeable mindset of a top sales professional.

lessons.title: Overcoming Call Reluctance
lessons.description: Eliminate fear and build confidence to make high-stakes sales calls consistently.

lessons.title: Handling Rejection Like a Pro
lessons.description: Turn rejection into fuel for success and maintain motivation through any sales slump.

lessons.title: Building Long-term Client Relationships
lessons.description: Create lasting relationships that generate repeat business and referrals for years.

lessons.title: Your 90-Day Action Plan
lessons.description: Create your personalized roadmap to becoming a 7-figure sales professional.

2.title: Atomic Habits Masterclass - Build Systems for Success
2.description: Master the science of habit formation and behavior change. Create systems that make success inevitable and transform your daily routines.

instructor.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
instructor.bio: Behavioral psychologist and habit formation expert. Author of 3 bestselling books on personal development and productivity.

whatYouWillLearn: Understand the psychology of habit formation
Build habits that stick using the 4 Laws of Behavior Change
requirements: Commitment to implementing what you learn

modules.title: The Science of Habit Formation
modules.description: Understanding how habits work and why they're so powerful.

lessons.title: The Habit Loop Explained
lessons.description: Learn the neurological loop that drives every habit and how to hack it for positive change.

lessons.title: Why Habits Matter More Than Goals
lessons.description: Discover why focusing on systems rather than goals leads to better long-term results.
